meanings.sent1: The anticolonialists fought bravely for their independence.
meanings.sent2: Many anticolonialists protested against the unjust rule.
meanings.sent3: The anticolonialists' determination was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent4: In history, anticolonialists were like warriors battling for freedom.
meanings.sent5: The image of the anticolonialists' struggle remains vivid in our minds.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to opposition to colonialism.
meanings.sent2: Her speech was filled with anticolonialists sentiments.
meanings.sent3: The anticolonialists perspective offered a fresh view on history.
meanings.sent4: The impact of their anticolonialists stance was profound.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the flag symbolized their anticolonialists spirit.
